resources.string:
STEPS : 
 1. Show you are listening and calmly ask them how you can help.
 2. Be considerate of what is going on around them and what they need.

MORE STEPS
 1. Show you are listening and calmly ask them how you can help. You must try to establish trust by showing them respect.

2. Be considerate of what is going on around them and what they need. Remember that they may have difficulty letting you know what they need. For example, they may not speak English very well or be able to hear you.
